subject: Re: [junit] Thread
msgSnippet: It s a agent in a A.I. simulation. There s a method that gives a objective to him, so it registers and active a new thread to work about it conquer it. After
messageBody:
It's a agent in a A.I. simulation. There's a method
that gives a objective to him, so it registers and
active a new thread to work about it conquer it. After
some refactoring, I realized that it became too simple
to break, so it's not a problem anymore...

--- Bob Koss <koss@...> escreveu:
